full_summary:
# Tender Notice
## NOTICENUMBER
- 01586-230095
## TITLE
- Custom Plot Seeder

### Tender Details

- **Reference Number**: WS4279226925-Doc4361566741
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4279226925
- **Publication Date**: December 20, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 27, 2023, by 14:00 EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
- **Expected Contract End Date**: November 11, 2024
- **Tender Status**: CANCELLED

### Product/Service Description
Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide one (1) custom-built Zero-till plot seeder with adjustable row spacing (22.86 cm to 68.58 cm) for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada. The Zero-till plot seeder is a specialized piece of agricultural machinery designed to plant seeds directly into the soil without tilling or disturbing the existing soil. The adjustable row spacing feature allows for flexible planting configurations.

### Tendering Procedure
This tender opportunity is available on SAP Ariba. There are no fees to access the information or bid on SAP Ariba. Bidders can access the tender notice and supporting documentation on the SAP Ariba website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18322224.

**Amendment:** Please note that the tender closing date has been corrected to January 3, 2024, at 15:00 EST. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by this date and time. Bids submitted after this deadline will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Key Terms and Conditions
- **Tendering Method**: Competitive Bidding
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Contact Information
The contact information for this tender is as follows:

- **Contact Person**: Baessler, Nancy (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Contact Email**: nancy.baessler@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Contact Address**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSP
